issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
networkTypeName returns value as "UNKNOWN" when connected to wifi.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Package KS and deploy. Open the url in mobile browser.
2. Navigate to Platform>Network

Expected Result:
1. networkTypeName must be "WIFI"

Actual Result:
1. Returns networkTypeName as "UNKNOWN"
fields.environment:
Test Environment:

Appc Studio: 3.2.3.201404031900
Sdk:3.2.3.v20140403105720
alloy:1.3.1
titanium:3.2.3-alpha2
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1-alpha
Osx: Maverick(10.9.2)
Browser: Safari, Chrome
Device:iPhone 5C(7.1),Nexus7(v4.3)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
